name: Cloak of Calamity
description:
Escape from Hell by any means necessary. Absorb your enemies' powers and skills, solve puzzles, and fight your way out of the darkness to light.

Controls

W, A, S, D - Up, Left, Down, Right

J - hold to run

K - Attack

L - Perform a skill

I - Change weapon

O - Toggle through skills

Esc - Pause menu
